snippet.title: Arma 3 - Community Guide: Ground Vehicle Crew
snippet.description:
Welcome to the official Community Guide video series for Arma 3!

In co-operation with Andrew Gluck (better known as Dslyecxi) from the ShackTactical community, Bohemia Interactive is creating a series of video to explain some of the basics of Arma 3. This new video explores some of the core principles of ground vehicle combat, while taking a closer look at each crew member's responsibilities.*

*The footage in this video was recorded from Arma 3 version 1.22. Game content and features may have changed in later versions. For more information, please visit the Arma 3 Dev Hub: https://dev.arma3.com/

Check out the entire Community Guide video playlist at http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfUcrRpCM_fLrk4KKLkQKrlTBh7txPaO3

Take a look at Dslyecxi's personal YouTube channel for more videos: http://www.youtube.com/user/dslyecxi/

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open - Arma 3 sends you to war.

Web - http://www.arma3.com
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
